settings.title: Business Done Differently.
settings.text: We are making the world's most expensive yoga mat to manufacture as affordable as possible for the general public. High-end made accessible, with a sprinkle of impact on top - now that's something we can all stand behind.

settings.title: Giving
settings.text: With every purchase, REECH helps provide clean water, food security, protection of the Amazon, and reforestation to our wonderful planet and the people on it by donating 20% profit. Practice while feeling good.

settings.title: OUR MISSION
settings.text: Our mission is to provide you with an all in one, go to yoga mat. You'll never slip, be fully supported, and be happy to purchase a yoga mat that's good for the planet (your body included). When you purchase with Reech Earth, it's always with a greater purpose.

settings.title: Ambassadors Join
settings.text: The Reech Earth Ambassador Program

settings.title: OUR STORY
settings.text: Yoga is full of impact, but why aren't our yoga mats? As an experienced yoga instructor, I've had handfuls of trails and errors with different yoga mats. No matter how great the quality of a yoga mat, it never made sense to me why mats hadn't come with a greater purpose envisioned. Let's change the way we think about yoga mats, and change the world together.

settings.title: GRIP
settings.text: Our yoga mats are designed and built from a team of yoga enthusiasts and instructors. Yoga mats should perform in any environment, sweaty or not. After years of experience testing different yoga mats, we've gathered the best aspects of them all and put them into one. We pride ourselves in the freedom and safety you'll feel from our superior grip, guaranteeing you won't ever slip (even in puddles of sweat).

settings.title: OUR MATS
settings.text: We started off with a simple idea, to create the very best yoga mat on the market and give back while we do it. Change happens when we practice yoga. Whether it's mind or body, we wanted to make a mat that you can rely on to help empower that change within yourself, and the world.

settings.title: SUSTAINABILITY
settings.text: It's important to us that your yoga mat is not only good for your practice, but it's also good for your body and the planet. So we've sourced recycled tree rubber and eco-friendly polyurethane for our mats, making them hypoallergenic, non-toxic, and odor free. We've also paired our green mat with Eden Reforestation Projects — a non-profit that empowers people and alleviates suffering by reforesting the planet. With every  mat sold, 60-100 trees are planted.

settings.review_slide_title: "I’ve been practicing on it the past few days and I absolutely love it! And the color - so fun. You guys did a great job! It has an awesome thickness and is very sticky so I’m not slipping around."

"I’ve only ever found two yoga mats that are actually as slip and sweat resistant as they claim - and this is one of them! I can literally be dripping wet, fresh out of the ocean or pool, and not slip an inch!  @reechearth mats are officially Sjana approved."
I love that this mat is antibacterial! So I feel comfortable putting my sweaty face on the mat!

settings.title: What does an ambassador do?
settings.text: Our ambassadors share their love of their REECH mats with their students and studios. Ambassadors are also eligible to collaborate with us on photoshoots, online content, and product development.
settings.text1: Ambassadors will receive their own public profile on the REECH site, giving some information about themselves and exposure of their current teaching schedule (or where to find them!) to visitors of the REECH site. Ambassadors will also receive newsletters with updates and opportunities from within REECH HQ, a custom $40 discount code for their first REECH mat, and can very likely be featured on our blog and or social media.
settings.text2:
We happily accept Yoga teachers with 200 hours of certification, or equivalent in training, who are highly active within their yoga communities (either in the studio, or online). Teachers who are leading retreats, workshops, or trainings regularly and are putting their message out with a passion on social media are highly sought for applicants!

If you fit the qualifications listed, please apply to become a REECH ambassador below! Once we receive your application, we will be in touch within 10 business days.

Please note that REECH Earth may contact the studios you've listed to verify information and employment status.
